rules_text:
Nessian Woods enters tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {G}.
{6}{RG}: Nessian Woods becomes a 5/4 red and green Dryad creature with trample until end of turn. It’s still a land. This ability costs {X} less to activate, where X is your devotion to red and green. Activate only once each turn.
